name: Phasmin Basmin
description:
Phasmin Basmin is a fast-paced top-down parody minigame based off of the early-access multiplayer horror title Phasmophobia.

You, the ghost hunter, must search the house for the Ghost using a variety of Detection Equipment at your disposal, including but not limited to Salt, EVP Recorders, and Chalk.

There are also less essential items like Dowsing Rods, Photo Cameras, and Mobile Phones; these can be used to locate, earn extra money from, or play with the Ghost.

The Ghost has four potential types of Evidence, and will choose two at random for you to find. Once you have your two options written down, collect your gear and go back to the Utility Area, which acts as a shop and safe haven, and leave the house with the big red button to see if you are right.

If you are connected to the internet, the game will look for updates, and if there is one available you have the option to visit this web page (though in DEV-002B, the game instead links to my blog page).
